item.title: How do i change max stat lv from 99 to 135 or 200
item.dc:creator: @99str3ngth99 99str3ngth99
item.description:
@99str3ngth99 wrote:

search for public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

then change the 99 to whatever u want

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
		int points = 0;
		int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
    		return lvl;
		}
		}
		return 99;
